name: Super Boys - The Big Fight
description:
CHECK OUR NEWEST GAME: Toon Shooters 2! (Otis & Angelica from Super Boys are there)

The year is 2019 and everyone's bored of TV, celebrities and games. Everything is inflated.

SUPERBOYS - The Big Fight, is an ultra violent TV show where fighters from across the globe form teams that clobber each other for glory, fame & everything else.

The overpowered Heroes and Bosses of old games are being crushed and have to team up to survive the onslaught against an enemy they cannot defeat, the new Super Boys.

Featuring characters from all of our worlds (Maximus, Toon Shooters, Blackmoor, Bearadise+) and a special appearance by... the Purple Shirted Eye Stabber from Cyanide & Happiness (explosm.net)!

Features:
• 53 unique playable characters (6 types, Warriors, Undead, Toons, Techs, Beasts & Wizards)
• Team building, assemble your own combination of fighters
• 20 arena maps
• Ascend the Tower (of Big Dreams) , 100+ stages
• Realtime PVP compete for ratings, Tag-Team or FFA (8 Player) - bash your friends up
• Ladder PVP
• Incredible face smashing music by Matthew Pablo

Recommended
• iPhone 5/iPad3/iPad Mini2

Required
• Internet connection.
• You need to sign-up with any e-mail and/or Facebook. It's quick either way.

PRIZE DISCLAIMER:
This game does NOT have real prizes that you can win/redeem.
Everything is digital for SATIRE purposes only. Your fighters can use digital items for in-game (stats).

This game does contain a few in-apps, that can be unlocked through gameplay.

Known issues:
- Multiplayer timeout not always kicking players out
- Max capped characters can't upgrade more stats

What's coming up:
- Character sorting
- Stage/character addition
- Hardcore tower
- Who's Next better matchmaking for ratings
-


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Next game:
Boot Club: Brawlers & Toon Shooters 2: The Freelancers

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you're having weird multi-touch issues, this usually does the trick, go to:

Settings >General > Accessibility > Zoom > Turn Off

http://www.facebook.com/mooffgames
http://www.mooffgames.com

Matthew Pablo is an incredible composer that we had the pleasure to work with. If you want to hear more passionate pieces go check out his site, and even drop him a line.. he's cool dude:
http://www.matthewpablo.com

If you want a pro fight announcer, check out Elliot Gindi:
https://twitter.com/TCZElliot
